title: Ferenc Gyurcsány
summary: Ferenc Gyurcsány (Hungarian pronunciation: [ˈfɛrɛnt͡s ˈɟurt͡ʃaːɲ] (listen); born 4 June 1961) is a Hungarian entrepreneur and politician. He was Prime Minister of  Hungary from 2004 to 2009. Prior to that, he served as Minister of Youth Affairs and Sports between 2003 and 2004.
